content: काकः [कै शब्दकरणे-कन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 43</ls>] {@--1@} A crow; काकोपि जीवति चिराय बलिं च भुंक्ते <ls>Pt. 1. 24.</ls> {@--2@} (Fig.) A contemptible fellow, base or impudent person. {@--3@} A lame man. {@--4@} Bathing by dipping the head only into water (as crows do). {@--5@} A sectarial mark ( तिलक). {@--6@} A kind of measure. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Dvīpa. --का <ab>N.</ab> of several plants: काकनासा, काकोली &c. --की A female crow. --का {@--1@} A multitude of crows. {@--2@} A modus coeundi.
